metadata.Title: CVE-2021-3773 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium.
metadata.Description: A flaw in netfilter could allow a network-connected attacker to infer openvpn connection endpoint information for further use in traditional network attacks.

notes.Note: sbeattie> no identified fix in the upstream kernel as of 2022-01-27

criterions.comment: linux package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
linux-allwinner: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of life, was needs-triage').
linux-aws package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
